skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Increases the duration of all debuffs on each target by 1 turn, then places a [Provoke] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn. Places a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 2 turns equal to 30% of damage inflicted. Damage increases by 10% for each debuff on the target.
